text: Let's start by looking at the project setup. The package dot json defines our todo app and includes a start script.
Next, we define the Todo class. It tracks an id, title, and completion status, with a toggle method to flip the state.
The store layer wraps an array of todos and provides add, remove, toggle, list, and counts operations.
Finally, the entry point wires everything together — adding todos, toggling completion, filtering by status, and exporting to JSON and Markdown.
